bloodthirster.name: Bloodthirster
bloodthirster.description: 50% Lifesteal. Heal by 50% of the damage dealt by basic attacks.

cursed-blade.name: Cursed Blade
cursed-blade.description: Attacks have a 20% chance to Reduce enemy's star level by 1

force-of-nature.name: Force of Nature
force-of-nature.description: Wearer does not count against the unit cap.

frozen-heart.name: Frozen Heart
frozen-heart.description: Adjacent enemies Attack Speed is 20% Slower.

guinsoos-rageblade.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
guinsoos-rageblade.description: Attacks grant 3% Attack Speed. Stacks infinitely.

hextech-gunblade.name: Hextech Gunblade
hextech-gunblade.description: Heal for 25% of all damage dealt.

hush.name: Hush
hush.description: Attacks have a 30% chance to Silence.

ionic-spark.name: Ionic Spark
ionic-spark.description: Whenever an enemy casts a spell, they take 200 damage.

locket-of-the-iron-solari.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
locket-of-the-iron-solari.description: On start of combat, all adjacent allies gain a shield of 200.

ludens-echo.name: Luden's Echo
ludens-echo.description: Spells deal 200 splash damage on hit.

morellonomicon.name: Morellonomicon
morellonomicon.description: Spells deal burn damage equal to 2.5% of the enemy's maximum health per second.

rapid-firecannon.name: Rapid Firecannon
rapid-firecannon.description: Wearer's attacks cannot be dodged. Attack Range is doubled.

red-buff.name: Red Buff
red-buff.description: Attacks deal 2.5% Maximum Health burn damage. Burned units cannot heal.

redemption.name: Redemption
redemption.description: On death, heal all nearby allies for 1000 Health.

runaans-hurricane.name: Runaan's Hurricane
runaans-hurricane.description: Attacks 2 additional enemies. These additional attacks deal 50% damage.

seraphs-embrace.name: Seraph's Embrace
seraphs-embrace.description: Regain 20 mana each time a spell is cast.

spear-of-shojin.name: Spear of Shojin
spear-of-shojin.description: After casting an ability, wearer gains 15% of its max mana per attack.

statikk-shiv.name: Statikk Shiv
statikk-shiv.description: Every 3rd attack deals 100 splash magical damage.

sword-breaker.name: Sword Breaker
sword-breaker.description: Attacks have a 20% chance to disarm.

sword-of-the-divine.name: Sword of the Divine
sword-of-the-divine.description: Each second, the wearer has a 5% chance to gain 100% Critical Strike untill the end of the combat.

thornmail.name: Thornmail
thornmail.description: Reflect 35% of damage taken from attacks.

titanic-hydra.name: Titanic Hydra
titanic-hydra.description: Attacks deal 10% of the wearer's max Health as splash damage.

warmogs-armor.name: Warmog's Armor
warmogs-armor.description: Wearer regenerates 3% max Health per second.

zekes-herald.name: Zeke's Herald
zekes-herald.description: Adjacent allies gain 10% Attack Speed at the beginning of combat.

zephyr.name: Zephyr
zephyr.description: On start of combat, banish an enemy for 5 seconds. The unit that mirrors the wielder placement on the other side of the board is banished.
